author: cardano4climate
title: Climate Change: THE Challenge
description: 气候变化是人类未来的最大挑战。Cardano将如何为解决这个邪恶的问题作出贡献？

f6_assessments.q0: 在我看来，Cardano的使命的核心目标是将世界转变为一个更好的地方。  实现这一目标的核心是应对气候变化。利用围绕能源消耗的问题，以及Cardano作为权益证明区块链的 "低能耗特征"，并建立有助于与专业性、透明度、诚实和诚信的目标相一致的项目，应该是Cardano使命的核心，而且我认为它们是。这将有助于确保气候问题是这些目标的一部分。  挑战赛的设置也将吸引大量有创意的建设者和投票者进入生态系统。
f6_assessments.q1: 作为一个活跃的社区成员，我有信心说，社区肯定有能力应对这一挑战。  已经有许多建议与拟议的挑战设置的目标相一致，而且挑战的成功肯定会吸引许多新的和创新的想法。
f6_assessments.q2: 我的拙见是，成功标准和建议的衡量标准是为应对这一挑战而设定的。我绝不是气候变化科学领域的专家，但是，我觉得PSM（提案成功指标）虽然有点宽泛，但足以为可衡量的关键绩效指标设定一个框架或一套期望。然而，我可能希望看到一些提示或建议，以量化诸如 "将创造的意识有多大 "的事情。  但我想这更多是由那些有问题需要解决并提交给气候变化挑战赛的提议者来提出这些细节，对吗？(基于他们项目中的具体内容！）。
f6_assessments.reply:
Thank you for this amazing proposal-assessment!
We think this is the case, some proposals might not be interested in raising awareness at all until a later stage of their journey some may want to measure clicks and viewtime others attendance.

f6_assessments.q0: A Climate Change dedicated Challenge might indeed  incentivize further development on  impactful real world use cases  in innovative ways. We have seen during  past funds many Climate Change related proposals scattered through different challenges and in my view some very good ideas didn't obtain enough attention to develop and be fruitful.  We can ascertain community willingness in putting forward creative proposals addressing  human activity and climate.  Furthermore, community interest in proposing Climate themed solutions will enable a diverse evolution of developer and open source app ecosystem with global impact. We have seen already in past funds an array of proposals  related to waste management, circular economies, sustainable housing, animal conservation, farming and so on. Climate Change affects everyone and everything on the planet.  In conclusion I shall pose the question : How is this challenge not critical to achieve Cardano's mission?
f6_assessments.q1:
A strong and active community was born around this Challenge named Climate4Change  present regularly in Catalyst events. This is the second time the Challenge proposal seeks voters approval. The Challenge Setting proposal didn't  pass F6 voting round, nonetheless a big Challenge team of motivated people is ready to rock. Many Climate Change related proposals have been submitted scattered through out different challenges in  past funding rounds, testifying the community capabilities. 
A budget rationale of 500K is given and seems quite sensible and proportionate to the overall F8 Challenge Setting budget allocation of 3-4%.
f6_assessments.q2: I believe Key Metrics could have been more developed and detailed such as: organizations engagement, local communities involvement,  partnerships, population numbers, waste management volumes, carbon credits, geographical areas coverage, and so on. The Proposal Success metrics are listed in questions "how big.." . These are non quantifiable measures causing difficulty on auditability, however Challenge team could  revisit  those metrics further down the line, once proposal get voters approval.
f6_assessments.reply:
Thank you for this amazing assessment!
As you already said those are non quantifiable measures causing difficulty on auditability, still those measurements seem really interesting and we will keep them in mind for this fund and further C4C proposals!

f6_assessments.q0: Cardano's ecosystem and blockchain technology lack meaningful connections to the real world. As a result of this challenge, we may be able to bridge the gap between decentralized finance and campaigns to combat climate change and bring tremendous value and good publicity to the cause. Having an understanding of how climate change impacts Cardano and its users would be helpful to guide proposers.
f6_assessments.q1: The Catalyst community already has the skillsets required to design decentralized applications, protocols, and incentives to regenerate local and regional ecosystems and economies. The Cardano community is one of the most intellectually vigorous and inventive on the planet. They are more than capable of handling this.
f6_assessments.q2: Proposers define success measures that are simple, quantitative, and auditable. In this way, the community will know how close or far a certain initiative is to success. In this regard, I agree that the success criteria and suggested metrics are appropriately defined to track progress in addressing the challenge.
f6_assessments.reply: Thank you for this amazing assessment, please join us in one of our future meetups and get to know the community. We are very glad you approve of our cause!

f6_assessments.q0: This challenge is critical to achieving Cardano's mission, since contributing to addressing climate change is tied to Cardano's mission as a world changer. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's alignment, I can rate the alignment of this proposal with a score of 5.
f6_assessments.q1: Undoubtedly, the Catalyst community has the capacity to address this challenge, since this community has many members coming from academic space, and, there is an existing telegram community related to this proposed challenge consisting of very active members. Based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's feasibility, I can rate the feasibility of this proposal with a score of 5.
f6_assessments.q2: Suggested metrics are logical and measurable to measure progress in addressing the challenge, except one that is quite unclear/hard to measure ["Is your proposal financially sustainable after funding?"]. Therefore, based on the given information, I still agree with this proposal's verifiability, I can rate the verifiability of this proposal with a score of 5
f6_assessments.reply: Thank you for this fantastic review!

importance: 遗留系统在气候变化问题上让我们失望了!这是卡达诺的机会，证明它可以建立再生的、更好的系统。
success: 通过现在和将来成功培育和完成催化剂项目，气候变化的影响已经大大减少。
